title: Ultra long battery life
description: Intelligent peripheral power management. Power down processor, sensors and radio transmitters separately as needed. Current consumption down to microampers and below. Run months or even years without changing battery.

title: Multi purpose
description: A whole family of modular boards makes possible to build a system for your specific pupose, without compromising performance. Wide range of accurate sensors, three different MCUs and four radios, including Bluetooth LE and 868 MHz!

title: Arduino Compatible
description: Use the Arduino IDE for programming in C++ as for any other Arduino board. Examples available to make use of the Aistin sensor boards and radios. Meet the Arduino community with Aistin!

title: Easy to use
description: Preloaded example applications let you enjoy instantly. And to proceed with your own project there is comprehensive documentation and datasheets available, with example codes.

title: Modular but compact
description: Very tiny size brings you from desktop prototypes into wrist prototypes! Even when you need several add-on boards the system does not get clums, but stays compact and robust.

title: Add your own cover
description: To finish your design, 3D cover models are provided. Download and adjust to meet your own taste! There are several affordable print services out there with a wide range of different materials. Basic models are also provided ready-made.
